meanings.sent1: The old, dusty attic had an uninviting smell.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had an uninviting exterior.
meanings.sent3: The uninviting cafeteria food made the students opt for packed lunches.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds cast an uninviting shadow over the beach.
meanings.sent5: The uninviting forest was shrouded in mist, adding to its eerie atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The security guard's stern expression made him seem uninviting.
meanings.sent2: The hotel staff's uninviting attitude left a bad impression on the guests.
meanings.sent3: The uninviting weather forced the picnic to be moved indoors.
meanings.sent4: The dark alley looked uninviting, deterring pedestrians from walking through.
meanings.sent5: The uninviting silence of the library was broken only by the turning of pages.
